document.full_text: emergency officials on sunday had issued evacuation notices to more than 1,300 memphis area homes, warning they were at risk of dangerous flooding as the region braces for the highest mississippi river crest since 1937.
document.title: memphis-area residents await mississippi flooding
lines_and_colors: emergency officials on sunday had issued evacuation notices to more than 1,300 memphis area homes, warning they were at risk of dangerous flooding as the region braces for the highest mississippi river crest since 1937.
